objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='diagonalGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFF5F5'/><stop offset='50%' stop-color='#FFE4E1'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FFDAB9'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='complementGradient' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#F5A9A9'/><stop offset='50%' stop-color='#F8C4B4'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#F5CBA7'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#complementGradient)'/><path d='M0 0 L1080 0 L0 1080 Z' fill='url(#diagonalGradient)'/><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='80' fill='#FFCBA4' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='300' cy='150' r='50' fill='#F5A9A9' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='850' cy='850' r='100' fill='#FFD1DC' opacity='0.15'/><circle cx='900' cy='750' r='60' fill='#FFC0CB' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M50 500 L150 600' stroke='#FFC0CB' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M900 200 L1000 300' stroke='#FFB6C1' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3'/><g transform='rotate(-10, 540, 540)'><rect x='300' y='800' width='600' height='3' fill='#E6A8BC' opacity='0.4'/><rect x='350' y='830' width='500' height='2' fill='#E6A8BC' opacity='0.3'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
✦ 925 Sterling Silver
✦ Certificate of Authenticity
✦ 6 Month Warranty
✦ Perfect Gift for Her

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

- Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 71 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner features a visually striking design with a soft, pastel diagonal gradient background blending hues of cream, light pink, and warm peach. Two semi-transparent circles and subtle lines are included to add depth and texture. The focal point is a pair of intricately designed rose gold earrings placed prominently on the right center. The product name is divided into a bold heading (`heading`) and an all-caps subheading (`subheading`), aligned on the left. Below the product title, essential features are listed in a neatly formatted bulleted list (`description`). The pricing (`price`) is highlighted in a contrasting deep red, followed by a magenta-colored rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with white uppercase text (`cta`). 

Color Palette:
- #FFF5F5 (Cream Pink)
- #FFE4E1 (Blush Pink)
- #FFDAB9 (Peach)
- #8B4513 (Brown - Text)
- #A0522D (Light Brown - Subheading)
- #8B0000 (Dark Red - Price)
- #C43B68 (Magenta - CTA Button)
- #FFFFFF (White - CTA Text)
product_color: The product image features elegant, floral-inspired earrings that blend soft, feminine tones with sparkling brilliance. The primary color is a delicate **rose gold** (#EC9CAC), used in the metal framework, which brings warmth and luxury. This is beautifully paired with **clear white crystals** (#FFFFFF) that enhance sparkle and catch light for visual contrast. The soft **blush pink enamel** (#F9C5D1) in the petal shape adds a romantic touch, seamlessly blending with rose gold while standing out subtly. The **silver crystal reflections** (#D9D9D9) add depth and dimension. Together, these tones create a harmonious and sophisticated palette for an ad, exuding elegance and charm.
